text: The best place to gather for friends and family. The service attendance was so helpful and explained that there are so many details, especially the sugar levels. Also, the taste of the cake is such a great taste. The 2nd level is the area to enjoy the best environment in this shop. You can view all the shops within this area. Besides that, there are plenty of seats at the balcony that make you feel better or have a great life in this moment.

Nice place to hangout with family and friends. It's very cozy. The food is affordable and has good portion. They taste good as well. The drinks are fresh and delicious. Their mango souffle is delicious. It's quiet during weekdays.
This place is great for celebrating birthdays. They have a wide variety of drinks, but the food options are a bit limited. Overall, it's a good place.
Superb love the place over here! We as a parent can enjoy eating at the same time got the big playground can let childrenâ€™s to play at their own!

Always come here for their souffle cakes, all flavors are yummy. They have the durian flavor now, must try out! Their drinks also very nice. A place where you can enjoy food and dessert, and your kids can play over there. Deco is good enough. Hopefully the staff can be more helpful and friendly.
